Gisborne volunteer Dot McCulloch steps down from Care and Craft Centre after 35 years https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisborne-volunteer-dot-mcculloch-steps-down-from-care-and-craft-centre-after-35-years/NRSYHZ3IHRFDNBSVR7U4OMBIEA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisborne-volunteer-dot-mcculloch-steps-down-from-care-and-craft-centre-after-35-years/NRSYHZ3IHRFDNBSVR7U4OMBIEA/ Wynsley WrigleyDot McCulloch continues her work with Makaraka Cemetery Trust. Tuesday was McCulloch's last official day at the centre, as she has retired after more than 35 years of service. Photo / Wynsley Wrigley
